articles.title: Trump talks Ukraine peace deal with Macron, Merz and Starmer - Politico
articles.description: The call came days after the president blasted European leadership in an interview with POLITICO.
articles.content: The president has wavered in his faith in Ukraine since returning to the White House, telling Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy in a February White House confrontation that he didnt have the ca… [+1358 chars]

articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: Sperm donor with rare cancer mutation fathered nearly 200 children in Europe - Ars Technica
articles.description: Children with the mutation have up to a 90% chance of developing cancer by age 60.
